name: taokb
short_description:
taokb.com is a reality and free community
To avoid having to type your password every time for your CVS/SVN/SSH developer account, you may upload your public key(s) here and they will be placed on the CVS/SVN server in your ~/.ssh/authorized_keys file.
To generate a public key, run the program 'ssh-keygen'. The public key will be placed at '~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub'. Read the ssh documentation for further information on sharing keys.
You can use OpenSSH2 format key only
Require ssh key regist to use PersonalForge
We recommend you to use SSH public key access to shell service
We recommend you to use SSH public key access to Git/Subversion/CVS repos
Please refer urls bellow about SSH key
summary: taokb.com is a reality and free community
